Type.Name: DragEndHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragEndHandler(object o, DragEndArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DragEndHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DragEndHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DragEndHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DragEndHandler is removed from the event.
